lines.korean: one look, give 'em whiplash
lines.translation: 看一眼，就讓他們感到頸部抽搐般的震撼

analysis.explanation: 英文歌詞，'em 是 them 的縮寫。Whiplash 指的是突然的衝擊或震撼。

lines.korean: Beat drop with a big flash
lines.translation: 節奏伴隨著巨大的閃光落下

analysis.point: Beat drop with a big flash

lines.korean: 집중해 좀 더 think fast
lines.translation: 集中精神 再快點思考

analysis.explanation: 집중하다 (集中) 的非格式體命令形

lines.korean: 이유 넌 이해 못 해 uh
lines.translation: 理由 你無法理解 uh

analysis.explanation: 너 (你) + -는 (主題助詞) 的縮略

lines.korean: 왜 이제야 know I did that, uh
lines.translation: 為何現在才 know I did that, uh

lines.korean: Day one, know I been bad, uh
lines.translation: 第一天起，就知道我很壞, uh

analysis.point: Day one, know I been bad, uh
analysis.explanation: 英文歌詞 (been 為 have been 的非正式用法)

lines.korean: Don't stop 흔들린 채
lines.translation: Don't stop 在動搖的狀態下

analysis.explanation: 흔들리다 (搖晃) 的過去定語形態 + -(으)ㄴ 채(로) (保持...的狀態)

lines.korean: 무리해도 can't touch that (can't touch that)
lines.translation: 即使勉強也 can't touch that (can't touch that)

lines.korean: Under pressure, body sweating, can you focus? (Yeah)
lines.translation: 在壓力之下，身體流汗，你能集中嗎？ (Yeah)

analysis.point: Under pressure, body sweating, can you focus? (Yeah)

lines.korean: 어디서나 거침없어 I'm the coldest
lines.translation: 無論在哪都肆無忌憚 I'm the coldest

analysis.explanation: 거침없다 (肆無忌憚，暢行無阻) 的非格式體
英文歌詞，指最冷酷、最厲害

lines.korean: 오직 나만이 이 판을 바꿀 changer
lines.translation: 只有我才是能改變這局面的 changer

analysis.explanation: 오직 (副詞，只有) + 나 (我) + -만 (只) + -이 (強調主格)
這 + 판 (局面，盤) + -을 (受格助詞) + 바꾸다 (改變) 的將來時定語形態

lines.korean: Fancy 이건 참 화려해
lines.translation: Fancy 這個真的很華麗

analysis.explanation: 참 (副詞，真的) + 화려하다 (華麗) 的非格式體

lines.korean: It's glowing and it's flashy (yeah)
lines.translation: 它在發光而且很 flashy (yeah)

lines.korean: 알아, 적당함이 뭔지 keep it classy
lines.translation: 知道，什麼是適當 keep it classy

analysis.explanation: 적당함 (適當，名詞形) + -이 (主格) + 무엇인지 (是什麼)

lines.korean: 따라 하지 넌 또 하나부터 열까지 (yeah)
lines.translation: 你又模仿著從一到十 (yeah)

analysis.explanation: 慣用語，從一到十，指全部

lines.korean: 아닌척하지 (yeah)
lines.translation: 假裝不是 (yeah)

analysis.explanation: 아니다 (不是) 的定語形 + 척하다 (假裝) + -지

analysis.explanation: 眼中 + 새기다 (雕刻) 的過去定語形
